participant_1.name: Walter
participant_1.personality: caring, humorous, and a bit nostalgic
participant_1.background: i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i was poor growing up. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries.

participant_2.name: Samantha
participant_2.personality: outgoing, creative, and passionate about music
participant_2.background: my favourite music is country music. i drive a nissan pathfinder. i've short brown hair. i'm a convenience store manager.

Hi! I'm going to a festival of a country music tonight! Do you want to gÐ¾ with me?
that sounds like fun . i'd love to go and take my seven girlfriends . hows it going today ?
Seven?! Are you very sociable?
i love listening to music , mostly nickelback . i'm vegan ! how are you ?
I'm not a vegan. I love meat to much. But on my salary of a store manager I have it only once a year. And what job do you have?
yea , it would have been unbearable without ac .
What?
a stick ! !. Also, try to guess: cheeseburgers are my ...
Enemy?
favorite food, funny you :)
Wait. You've said you are a vegan
yes , it helps me focus on my studies . do you cook ? ðŸ˜˜
Yep. I'm a master at this. And you?
yes i'm . i also design clothes . just opened my online shop in august
That is cool. And I've buy a new car recently
why do you want me to buy you a new car ?
I don't want you to buy a new car. But... I have a great variant for you...
you should get a bike too . but do not get a harley . how was your day ? ðŸ™ˆ
Great. I've cut my hair
what shape is your face ? highlights are awesome .
This is personal information
yep , i make a lot of money , but donate a lot of it and time to charity .. Also, try to guess: i was poor ...

growing up, funny you :)
